title: North East Line service delayed due to train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东北线列车故障导致服务延误
title_translations.ms: North East Line dijangka lewat kerana kegagalan tren
title_translations.ta: மின் தடங்கல் காரணமாக வடகிழக்கு பாதையில் சேவை தாமதமானது

updates.text: 17/07, 8.13am: NEL is back to regular svc at 0803hrs. Once again, we are very sorry for the inconvenience caused
8.02am: NEL svc is delayed due to a train fault at Clarke Quay North Bound. Additional travel time of up to 10 minutes may be expected.
